IPO

The Company was listed on Euronext on November 1987 after the issue of 12% of its capital to the public represented by 2.7 million shares and the Company’s market capitalization was worth 156 million euros.

Sustainability-linked bonds issuance

Mota-Engil has successfully completed two sustainability-linked bond issuances. In 2021 has raised a global amount of €110 million, with a maturity of 5 years and a fixed interest rate of 4.25%. In 2022 has raised a global amount of €70 million, with a maturity of 5 years and a fixed interest rate of 5.75%. The Company is committed to improve one KPI in order to reach a sustainability target as of 31 December 2025 and 2026 respectively; if these targets are not accomplished, the issuer commits to pay an additional €1.25 per bond until at the end of the periods.

“Part of a Company’s know-how is the ability to find the capital required to make its development”

António Mota – Chairman of the Board of Directors
